DOC.brief_summary: Randomized controlled trial evaluate Internet-delivered Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ( ICBT ) adapt pregnant woman suffer antenatal depression . The ICBT-program add treatment usual ( TAU ) compare TAU . Participants ( n=60 ) recruit Sweden ( Swedish citizen participate ) assess treated distance via secure web platform telephone .
DOC.detailed_description: In order evaluate feasibility effectiveness ICBT-program antenatal depression use large clinical trial , current RCT ( n=60 ) perform act pilot main study . Participants receive regular treatment ( TAU ) provide antenatal clinic health care instance . Half randomize add-on previously establish 10-week long ICBT-program depression general , adapt pregnant woman . The half receive TAU 10 week freely decide want participate pregnancy-adapted ICBT-program ( possible 10 week leave till estimate delivery date ) , start regular ICBT-program depression within 2-6 week post-partum , decline ICBT-treatment . The participant study recruit Sweden via internet , advertisement information antenatal clinic . A web-based screening questionnaire form basis first assessment review inclusion criterion , follow structure telephone interview diagnosis ( SCID-1 depression , adjust DSM 5 , M.I.N.I . diagnose assessment suicide risk ) suitability assess , CGI-rating perform , final decision inclusion make . Level depression pre- post-treatment assess MADRS-S fill via internet-treatment platform together self-rating measure use main study . Structured telephone interview hold post-treatment , primarily assess content TAU , administer CGI standardized version MADRS-S ( design replace miss questionnaire data ) , make qualitative evaluation participant view adapt ICBT-program . The estimated effect ICBT compare TAU 0.8 ( Cohen 's ) 60 participant attrition result statistical power 80 % initial , small RCT .
